clients.title: National Legal Aid
clients.description: Aura provided support to a large and complex project to simplify legal information across all states and territories in Australia. We work with multiple stakeholders to provide a comprehensive information resource around family violence law in Australia.

clients.title: Resolution Pathways
clients.description: Aura provided web development and project design services to Resolution Pathways to augment their capacity to resolve disputes for APRA AMCOS members and licensees.

clients.title: Resolve Advisors
clients.description: We provide technology consultation and support to Resolve Advisors to build solutions for dispute resolution, conflict management and automation.

clients.title: Yoga Vastu
clients.description: The world's leading Iyengar yoga video service. Built to connect a international group of experienced practitioners together with video, audio, social networking.

clients.title: Accessible CMS
clients.description: We created a cutting-edge content management system capable of producing websites that are accessible for people of all abilities.

clients.title: Blaqbox
clients.description: A tool for tracking cryptocurrency news, calendar events and price movements. A unique algorithm ranks news according to trust, reliability and price-impact.

clients.title: Elker
clients.description: Elker is an encrypted reporting and feedback tool which helps employees get support without risk and builds capacity for leaders to build strategy using data

clients.title: Womens Legal Service
clients.description: Aura developers built a directory of all resources for domestic violence services throughout Australia. Informational videos, database management and extensive consultation services included.
